audio.name: name
audio.fileTooLarge: File too large. Please select an audio under 50MB. {{file}}

video.name: name
video.fileTooLarge: File too large. Please select a video under 100MB. {{file}}

recording.cannotDetectAnySound: Cannot detect any sound in the recording, please check your microphone

conversation.name: Name
conversation.baseUrlDescription: leave it blank if you don't have one
conversation.temperatureDescription: The higher the temperature, the more creative the result
conversation.maxTokensDescription: The maximum number of tokens to generate
conversation.presencePenaltyDescription: Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
conversation.frequencyPenaltyDescription: Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
conversation.historyBufferSizeDescription: The number of message history to include in the context
conversation.numberOfChoicesDescription: The number of results to generate
conversation.ttsBaseUrlDescription: leave it blank if you don't have one
conversation.failedToGenerateResponse: Failed to generate response, please retry

explainations.pronunciationScore: Pronunciation score is the overall score of the pronunciation, fluency, completeness, and accuracy of the speech. The score is calculated by the weighted average of the four scores.
explainations.accuracyScore: Accuracy score is the accuracy of the speech. The accuracy indicates how close the speech is to the reference text.
explainations.fluencyScore: Fluency score is the fluency of the speech. The fluency indicates how smooth the speech is.
explainations.completenessScore: Completeness score is the completeness of the speech. The completeness indicates how complete the speech is.
explainations.prosodyScore: Prosody score is the prosody of the speech. The prosody indicates how natural the speech is.
explainations.omission: Omission is the words that are in the reference text but not in the speech.
explainations.insertion: Insertion is the words that are in the speech but not in the reference text.
explainations.misspronunciation: The pronunciation of the word is not correct.
explainations.unexpectedBreak: There is a break between two words when there is no punctuation between them.
explainations.missingBreak: There is no break between two words when there is a punctuation between them.

chatAgent.typeGptDescription: GPT agent can chat with you.
chatAgent.typeTtsDescription: TTS agent can convert text to speech.
chatAgent.typeSttDescription: STT agent can convert speech to text.
chatAgent.name: Name
chatAgent.nameDescription: Help you to identify this chat agent
chatAgent.descriptionDescription: Describe this chat agent shortly (Will not included in the prompt)
chatAgent.promptPlaceholder: You are my AI assistant, please answer my any questions.
chatAgent.promptDescription: The role definition (prompt) of the chat agent

chatMember.promptDescription: The extra prompt will be added to the system prompt of the chat agent. It is useful when you want to customize the chat agent's behavior in this specific chat.
chatMember.promptPlaceholder: For example: please use simple sentences as much as possible, and reply no more than 10 sentences at a time.
chatMember.atLeastOneAgent: The chat must have at least 1 agent.
chatMember.cannotAddMemberToThisChat: Cannot add member to this chat
chatMember.onlyGPTAgentCanBeAddedToThisChat: Only GPT agent can be added to this chat

chat.name: Name
chat.enableChatAssistantDescription: When enabled, you can use SUGGEST or REFINE to help you chat with the chat agent.
chat.enableAutoTtsDescription: When enabled, all replies will be converted to audio automatically.
chat.sttAiServiceDescription: Choose service to transcribe your speech to text.
chat.promptPlaceholder: For example: the chat is about how to learn English, please do not deviate from the topic.
chat.promptDescription: The prompt will be added to the system prompt of all chat agents in this chat. It is useful when you want to customize the chat agent's behavior in this specific chat.
chat.atLeastOneAgent: The chat must have at least 1 agent.
chat.onlyGPTAgentCanBeAddedToThisChat: Only GPT agent can be added to this chat

pleaseCompletePaymentInPopupWindow: Please complete payment in the popup window

enjoyAzureSpeechToTextDescription: Use Azure AI Speech to transcribe. It is a paid service from Enjoy.
enjoyCloudflareSpeechToTextDescription: Use Cloudflare AI Worker to transcribe. It is in beta and free for now.

inputReferenceTextOrLeaveItBlank: Input the reference text or leave it blank

libraryDescriptions.library: Contains all files created by Enjoy while you are using the app.
libraryDescriptions.database: Records all your activities and settings.
libraryDescriptions.audios: Contains all audio files you added.
libraryDescriptions.videos: Contains all video files you added.
libraryDescriptions.segments: Contains all segments you make recording or note.
libraryDescriptions.speeches: Contains all speeches created by AI TTS.
libraryDescriptions.whisper: Contains all whisper models you downloaded.
libraryDescriptions.waveforms: Contains all waveforms decoded from audio/videos. They're for caching. It's save to delete them.
libraryDescriptions.logs: Contains some logs helpful for debugging.
libraryDescriptions.cache: Contains cached files. They will be cleaned up automatically.

recordingIsTooLongToAssess: Recording is too long to assess. The maximum duration is 60 seconds.
selectDictFile: Select Dict Files (extension with .mdx and .mdd files)
dictFileRequired: Dict file (the extension is mdx) not found.
removeDictTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this dictionary?
removeDictDescription: It will delete the dictionary file from your local computer and you will have to download it again next time.
selectMdictFileOrDirTitle: Select dict files (.mdx and optional .mdd) or folder
dictImportSlowTip: Checking...(It may take longer if the dictionary file is large.)
adaptionDictTip: The adapted dictionaries have better usability.
mdictFileTip: Directly import .mdx .mdd format files (.mdx files are required, .mdd files are optional and can have multiple).
authorizationExpired: Your authorization has expired. Please login again.
exportRecordingsConfirmation: Select the highest score of the recordings of each segment to export as a single file.
upgradeNotice: Enjoy App v{{version}} is available. Please upgrade to the latest version.

gpt.temperatureDescription: The higher the value, the more creative the generated text, otherwise it is more stable
gpt.maxCompletionTokensDescription: The maximum number of tokens consumed per interaction, -1 means no limit
gpt.presencePenaltyDescription: -2.0 ~ 2.0, the higher the value, the more likely to expand to new topics
gpt.frequencyPenaltyDescription: -2.0 ~ 2.0, the higher the value, the more likely to reduce repetition
gpt.historyBufferSizeDescription: The more context, the more coherent the generated text, the more resources consumed
gpt.numberOfChoicesDescription: When greater than 1, it will generate multiple versions of text each time

confirmBeforeSending: You can re-record, modify the text content, and click send after confirming there are no errors.
removeChatMemberConfirmation: Are you sure to remove this member from the chat?
inviteAgentInChatAndReply: Invite @{{name}} into the chat and reply
chatInputPlaceholder: Enter to send, Shift+Enter to new line, @ to mention agents
replyOnlyWhenMentionedDescription: Will only reply when you mention this agent using @
deleteRecordingsWithScoreLessThan90: Delete recordings with score less than 90
deleteRecordingsWithScoreLessThan80: Delete recordings with score less than 80
bulkDeleteRecordingsConfirmation: This operation cannot be undone. Your recordings stats will be unchaged, but the recording files will be deleted permanently.
diskUsageDescription: The disk usage of Enjoy App.
